title: Define project scope and goals
description: Clearly outline the project's purpose, objectives, and the problem it aims to solve. This includes a detailed explanation of how the neural network-based assistant will coordinate tasks in a complex work environment, its intended benefits, and potential use cases.

title: Research Existing Neural Interface Solutions for Integration into AssistantOrchestrationNeural
description: Conduct a comprehensive review of current neural interfaces and their capabilities, including but not limited to their technical specifications, use cases, limitations, potential for integration within the AssistantOrchestrationNeural project, and provide a detailed report summarizing the findings.

title: Design neural interface architecture
description: Develop a conceptual design for the neural interface that meets project requirements.

title: Develop frontend components for the neural interface
description: Create user-facing elements of the neural interface based on the design.

title: Implement backend functionality for the neural interface
description: Develop server-side components that process data from the neural interface.

title: Integrate the neural interface with existing workflow systems
description: Link the neural interface with other tools and services used in the complex work environment.
dependencies: Develop frontend components for the neural interface
Implement backend functionality for the neural interface

title: Perform unit testing and debugging of the neural interface
description: Identify and fix any issues in the neural interface components.
dependencies: Develop frontend components for the neural interface
Implement backend functionality for the neural interface

title: Document the neural interface design and implementation
description: Create technical documentation for future reference and collaboration.
dependencies: Develop frontend components for the neural interface
Implement backend functionality for the neural interface
